page.title: 06KETTLETOFT PIER
page.content: Kettletoft pier is the only{main pier in our block. The boats that serve the pier are the{Orcadia}and the{Islander. {The Orcadia carries passengers, parcel {mail and cargo.}It is the other main transport system to the Island, along with the aeroplane. The Orcadia comes to the Island on 'Trip day' and takes the Island's people into Kirkwall on the Mainland for the day. The other day on which many islanders go on the boat is for the annual Inter-Island Sports, held on one or other of the main northern isles. The Islander takes 12 passengers and takes a lot of cargo. We have a{coal boat}which delivers coal to all the Islands twice a year. We have{another boat}which annually{collects tangle (seaweed) {from the isles. The pier is 170m long {and 25m wide.}It has two big buildings to keep the cargo in.
